experiment_name: Overriding Traditional Electronic Effects in Biocatalytic Baeyer-Villiger Reactions by Directed Evolution
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:30°C;    reaction_ph:7.4;    reaction_other_conditions:Whole cells with recombinant expressed protein;     15 h reaction time;     800 rpm shaking;     5% (v/v) methanol co-solvent;     NADP+ (100 µM), glucose dehydrogenase (200 U), glucose (200 mM) for NADPH regeneration;    reaction_substrate_concentration:10 mM
